roleset.name: make seem human or fit for humans

example.name: make fit
example.text: Council member Joy Picus, the measure's chief advocate, considers it part of a ``pro-family policy'' that [*T*-1] makes Los Angeles a leader in ``[*] humanizing the workplace.''
